message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
I'll meet you halfway, but not quite
You're getting closer, but I still want more!
I'll give you a bit more, but not too much
I'm getting desperate, but I'll take what I can get!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that little
I'm taking a risk, but I'll try to squeeze you dry!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that little
I'm taking a huge risk, but I'll try to get the majority!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
